fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: Task description
semantics.placeholder: Describe what your students should do ...

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Scoring mode
fields.description: Decide whether to give points for each correctly placed paragraph or for each paragraph that is placed immediately after the paragraph it is supposed to be placed after ("correct sequence")

fields.label: Apply penalties
fields.description: Decide whether to deduce a point for each paragraph that's not positioned correctly.

fields.label: Duplicate parapraphs interchangeable
fields.description: If set, when checking the answer, duplicate paragraphs will be treated as identical if their plain text is equal.

fields.label: Add buttons for movement
fields.description: On mobile devices, buttons for moving paragraphs can offer an extra accessibility benefit. If you prefer, you can deactivate them here.

fields.label: Title for button that is disabled
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct or incorrect.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The correct solution will be displayed.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all elements and start the task over again.

fields.label: Your result
fields.description: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.
@current will be replaced by the current paragraph number. @total will be replaced by the number of paragraphs.
fields.label: Paragraph numbering
Instruction when paragraph grabbed
fields.default: Press up and down arrow keys to change position, spacebar to drop, escape to cancel
